briefTitle: Biomarkers in Predicting Response to Tamoxifen and Letrozole in Postmenopausal Women With Primary Breast Cancer Treated on Clinical Trial CAN-NCIC-MA17
officialTitle: Quantitative Protein and Gene Expression Biomarkers of Tamoxifen and Letrozole Recurrence in the NCIC CTG MA.17 Cohort
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Prognostic utility of the MGH 2-gene and the GHI 21-gene expression signatures
eligibilityCriteria:
DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS:

* Histologically or cytologically confirmed primary invasive breast carcinoma resected at time of original diagnosis
* Treated on clinical trial CAN-NCIC-MA17
* Hormone receptor status:

  * Estrogen or progesterone receptor positive tumor

PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS:

* Female
* Postmenopausal

PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY:

* Not specified
